thread.title: Will EastEnders' Whitney Carter get pregnant? Shona McGarty hides figure with huge coat during filming
thread.title_full: Will EastEnders' Whitney Carter get pregnant? Shona McGarty hides figure with huge coat during filming - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Will EastEnders' Whitney Carter get pregnant? Shona McGarty hides figure with huge coat during filming
text:
Will EastEnders' Whitney Carter get pregnant? Shona McGarty hides figure with huge coat during filming The actress was spotted filming in the cold on set Share Comments By Alistair McGeorge 17:00, 16 FEB 2017 Updated 17:21, 16 FEB 2017 TV (Photo: ISOIMAGES LTD Disclaimer: Whilst ISO IMAGES Ltd uses its' best endeavours to establish the copyright and authenticity of all pictures supplied, it accepts no liability for any damage, loss or legal action caused by the use of images supplied. The publication of images is solely at your discretion.) Share Comments Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email EastEnders could be set for a pregnancy shock as things get more complicated for Whitney Carter.
After the barmaid's husband Lee left her on Valentine's Day, Whitney - who recently kissed his DAD Mick - is heartbroken, but the storyline could be taking more twists and turns before all is said and done.
The BBC soap has been shooting new scenes near a nightclub this week, and actress Shona McGarty kept her figure well hidden underneath a huge bulky coat.
Shona McGarty was spotted on set (Photo: ISOIMAGES) The soap star was seen holding the jacket closed as she shot new scenes with fellow actresses Lorna Fitzgerald and Jacqueline Jossa - who play sisters Abi and Lauren Branning.
Read More EastEnders fans left fuming as it's revealed show has been temporarily dropped to make way for FA Cup The trio were spied on set, and Shona's coat could suggest a legendary soap storyline if her character hooks up with Danny Dyer's Mick Carter.
She wasn't the only one wearing the oversized jacket (Photo: ISOIMAGES) However, given that the three actresses and their male co-stars were spotted wearing identical outfits, it could simply have been to battle the cold.
Read More Lee Ryan's joining EastEnders as Walford's new blue eyed boy - and he's set to cause a stir EastEnders really tugged at viewers' heartstrings this week , as Lee - whose depression has spiralled out of control - was warned off by his dad, after striking his wife.
Mick - who recently kissed Whitney after she survived the recent horror bus crash - advised his son to walk away before he hurt her any further.
Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Holly Willoughby reveals her most embarrassing TV Watch this video again Watch Next Paul Burrell claims the Queen eats her bananas wi 0:49 Lisa Riley breaks down on Loose Women as she reve 1:00 Youngest euromillions winner Jane Park explains w 0:47 Elderly whippet saves owner's life as she smells 1:23 Chloe Madeley continues to keep fit at the gym 0:33 Dad of five explains why OCD made him want to kil 1:09 Eamonn tells Ruth she has 'chunky legs' as Ferne 0:48 Stormzy seems unfazed after Police incident as he 1:57 Video will play in Eastenders viewers shocked as Lee hits Whitney Share this video Watch Next Whitney was heartbroken (Photo: BBC) It comes after she kissed Mick (Photo: BBC) On Tuesday night's episode, he decided to take his dad's advice - but in the cruelest fashion possible as he made his excuses to pop away from the table for five minutes during a romantic meal.
However, he never returned, leaving poor Whitney to pay the bill, and she later found he'd left her a letter at home which simply read: "I'm sorry but I just don't love you anymore."
